rows.label: qev056001_MSG0001
rows.name:
The thought of the divine Ovah coexisting within
organisms as primitive as a bio visigel is...shocking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0002
rows.name:
I knew you guys multiplied through division,
but this revelation about your Ovah is even more
of a surprise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire about Reproduction

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to hear more about Orphean reproduction.

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire about Ovah

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Han'barac what the Ovah is.

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0003
rows.name: The Ovah protects us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Whenever death approaches, we are able to divide
and live on so long as the Ovah resides within us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0005
rows.name: It is to us what your kind might call a god.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0006
rows.name:
The power of the Ovah protects all Orphe.
It is as a god to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Whenever death approaches, we are able to divide
and live on so long as the Ovah resides within us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0008
rows.name:
So reproduction by fission is a property of the Ovah
and not something intrinsic to the Orphe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0009
rows.name:
We Orphe would not exist without the Ovah.
For without it, we could not propagate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0010
rows.name:
The Ovah and Orphe are one. Yet now it extends its
influence to base creatures like the bio visigel...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0011
rows.name:
So in the end, the Ovah is a virus that heals its host
and aids in reproduction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yet only the Orphe are capable of serving as its hosts.
That has always been the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0013
rows.name:
And you have no idea why it might have branched out
to these visigels?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0014
rows.name:
I do not, unless... No, but that is preposterous.
I will not even entertain the thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0030
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0031
rows.name: Encourage Han'barac to share the possible reason.

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Han'barac if he's afraid of something.

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0015
rows.name:
I do have a hypothesis, but it remains precisely that.
I do not wish to discuss it until I know more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0016
rows.name:
It's rare to see a hyper-rational Orphean hesitate like
that. I guess you've got the same range of emotions
kicking around under the surface as we do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0017
rows.name:
But what separates us is that my kind maintains the
ability for calm reason no matter the circumstances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0018
rows.name:
Yes, I suppose that humans would describe this mental
state as fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0019
rows.name:
But we Orphe restrain our emotions in order to allow
for rational action in all situations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0020
rows.name:
So did you have an idea what could have caused the
Ovah to migrate to the visigels or not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0021
rows.name: I do. But it remains a hypothesis only.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0022
rows.name:
This weapon has been altered to halt the activity of the
Ovah within the target. Please use it to destroy those
visigels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Apparently there are 10 or so affected bio visigels in
Cauldros. The rest of the species is unchanged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0024
rows.name:
If you use this weapon to kill those 10 individuals,
we should see an end to this sudden visigel doubling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0025
rows.name:
...And there is one more thing I would like to verify,
so please bring some tissue samples back with you
when you are done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0026
rows.name: I will need more data to reach a sure conclusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0027
rows.name:
We need to stop this sudden boom in the bio visigel
population before it becomes a real threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0028
rows.name:
This affects the safety of everyone in New LA.
I appreciate your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0029
rows.name:
Eliminating 10 of the Cauldros bio visigels with this
weapon should put an end to their unnatural
multiplying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0077
rows.name:
Have you completed your assignment? Good.
Then I need you to return the anti-Ovah weapon to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0078
rows.name:
Hmm... It would facilitate this transaction if you could
kindly unequip it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0030
rows.name:
It is good to see you back safely.
I will begin analysis on those samples at once.
...May I have them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh, and the anti-Ovah weapon as well, if you please?
It should be of no use to you now that the bio visigels
have been eliminated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0032
rows.name:
Well, I now have a conclusive explanation why the
visigels were host to the Ovah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0050
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Han'barac about the cause.

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0060
rows.name: Mention

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0061
rows.name: Note that Han'barac sounds dejected.

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0033
rows.name:
The Ganglion brought my kind to Mira by force.
We numbered seven then, including myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0034
rows.name: But we only rescued five of you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0035
rows.name:
One escaped before you humans came to liberate us,
while the other elected to remain with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0036
rows.name: ...Even the Orphe has its share of disturbed individuals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0037
rows.name:
The remaining five of us sided with you humans,
trusting that you would be victorious in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0038
rows.name: But we heard nothing more from the one who escaped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0039
rows.name:
We all assumed he had successfully evaded the pursuers
sent by the Ganglion and gone into hiding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0040
rows.name:
But this round of analysis proves he was devoured by a
bio visigel instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0041
rows.name:
Because it entails the death of one of my people.
We numbered seven in total when the Ganglion
brought us to Mira by force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0042
rows.name: But we only rescued five of you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0043
rows.name:
One escaped before you humans came to liberate us,
while the other elected to remain with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0044
rows.name:
...Even we Orphe have individual exceptions to the
unanimous rule on rare occasions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0045
rows.name:
The remaining five of us sided with you humans,
trusting that you would be victorious in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0046
rows.name: But we heard nothing more from the one who escaped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0047
rows.name:
We all assumed he had successfully evaded the pursuers
sent by the Ganglion and gone into hiding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0048
rows.name:
But this round of analysis proves he was devoured by a
bio visigel instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0049
rows.name:
In the process of digesting an Orphean,
the bio visigel became host to his Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0050
rows.name:
Though that sounds simple enough, it is still quite
unbelievable that the Ovah and a visigel could coexist
in symbiosis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0051
rows.name:
But you said this round of analysis was conclusive,
right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0052
rows.name:
Correct. But being confronted with evidence that the
divine force that governs the prosperity of my people
can also dwell in a common beast is...terribly shocking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0053
rows.name: I never thought I would experience such an emotion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0070
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0071
rows.name:
Assure Han'barac that what he's
feeling is perfectly natural.

rows.label: qev056001_JNK0080
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: qev056001_SEL0081
rows.name:
Ask Han'barac if there might be
a reason for such compatibility.

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0054
rows.name:
We Orphe have always been the only compatible hosts
for the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0055
rows.name:
It is a special type of viral organism unable to survive
anywhere but inside an Orphean body. It is what
made us unique among higher lifeforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0056
rows.name:
All recorded instances of other organisms attempting to
take the Ovah into themselves have ended in failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0057
rows.name:
Other species cannot serve as hosts, let alone multiply
through division as the Orphe do. It should not be
possible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0058
rows.name:
Visigel physiology is pretty primitive, right? Maybe that
simplicity is what allowed them to be compatible with
the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0059
rows.name:
It seems like it would be easier to find a fit with a
basic biological system than with a more complex
lifeform.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0060
rows.name: Yeah, bio visigel physiology is pretty primitive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0061
rows.name:
Maybe that simplicity is what allowed them to be
compatible with the Ovah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0062
rows.name:
It seems like it would be easier to find a fit with a
basic biological system than with a more complex
lifeform.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0063
rows.name:
Perhaps, but this discovery still calls into question the
very reason for the Orphe's existence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0064
rows.name: The Ovah can only reside within the Orphe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0065
rows.name:
It is a special type of viral organism unable to survive
anywhere except inside an Orphean body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0066
rows.name:
It is unthinkable that any but the chosen Orphe could
contain the Ovah within them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0067
rows.name:
Let alone that some primitive species could multiply
through division as we advanced Orphe do!
It should not be possible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0068
rows.name:
Hey, don't let it get you down. It's un-Orphean-like.
At the end of the day, it's just a virus, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0069
rows.name: I will not allow you to speak of the Ovah in that way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0070
rows.name: Holy crap, you're angry? This IS rare![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0071
rows.name:
While it may appear to other races as a simple virus,
the Ovah is our protector and source of lifeâ€”our divine
spark, if you will. I must insist that you be respectful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0072
rows.name:
That's absolutely fair. Sorry if I upset you.
That wasn't my aim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0073
rows.name:
So long as you understand. ...In any case, we were
successful in removing the Ovah from the indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0074
rows.name:
That would not have been possible without your aid.
You humans truly are a most useful species.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0075
rows.name:
Aw, shucks. I'm glad our interests aligned on this.
With any luck, that'll continue to be the case for a
long time to come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056001_MSG0076
rows.name: That would be most pleasing.[ST:wait ]
